casebody.data:
FLINN
v.
MACK, LASSITER & SPENCER. No. 96P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 5, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Pete Mack, Andrew Lassiter, Cheryl Spencer, New Bern, for Mack, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of February 2007 by Plaintiff for "Application for Writ of Habeas Corpus":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of March 2007."
